title: InOrbit adds Steve Cousins to board, to offer OpenRobOps as open-source fleet manager
description:
InOrbit is working with academia, industry, and the open-source community to bring OpenRobOps to robotics fleet developers.

The post InOrbit adds Steve Cousins to board, to offer OpenRobOps as open-source fleet manager appeared first on The Robot Report.
